short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tip online creators and get tipped. Get quality video recommendations. Recommend your favourite videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Currently, Tip Your Homie is implemented only for YouTube, with plans to expand further in the future. The unique feature of Tip Your Homie is that it allows micro-tipping, as low as $0.01, and without any fees, made possible using the cryptocurrency called Nano as its currency medium. (We didn't create Nano, we are just providing a service using Nano)

Nano is a cryptocurrency well-known for its near-instant, feeless and eco-friendly transactions. You can exchange nano to any currency of your choice using exchanges like CoinEx, Binance and KuCoin.

You can create a free NANO address and start receiving direct tips for your videos on YouTube through Tip Your Homie.

To receive a tip, you simply need to add your NANO address in your YouTube channel's 'About' section
Instructions : Visit YouTube -> Your Profile -> Your Channel / Create a Channel -> Customise Channel -> Basic Info -> Paste your NANO address in the description box -> Publish


Official Nanocurrency Reddit page : https://www.reddit.com/r/nanocurrency/

Official Tip Your Homie Reddit page : https://www.reddit.com/r/tipyourhomie/
